title: Will any 2020 Democrat apologize to Brett Kavanaugh?
text:
It’s now been three days since The New York Times corrected — er, retracted — its attack against Justice Brett Kavanaugh. Turns out the “new allegation” isn’t supported by the victim, a fact conveniently left out of the story.

And still Kamala Harris, Liz Warren, Beto O’Rourke, Julian Castro and Pete Buttigieg have not apologized or reversed their calls for Kavanaugh to be impeached.

How long will it be before at least one of them shows the basic decency and fairness to take back the impeachment demand? We’re waiting.
description: It’s been three days since The New York Times corrected — er, retracted — its attack against Justice Brett Kavanaugh. Yet Kamala Harris, Liz Warren, Beto O’Rourke, Julian Castro and Pete Buttigieg have not apologized or reversed their calls for his impeachment.
